Detailed Description

Singleton which offers to interact with FSUIPC.

Test if the connection with FSUIPC is opened.

bool open ( CConnector::FSVersion  version = ANY  ) 

Open the connection with FSUIPC.

Parameters:
version the version of FlightSimulator.
See also:
FSVersion
Returns:
false if the connection fails, true otherwise.

bool process (  )  const

Process pending requests.

Note:
It is possible to enque several requests before processing them.

bool read ( DWORD  dwOffset,
T *  pDest,
bool  bAutoProcess = true 
) const [inline]

Read offset value from FSUIPC.

Template Parameters:
T the type of the offset (must be the exact alignment).
Parameters:
dwOffset the internal FSUIPC address of the offset.
pDest a pointer to the data to be filled.
bAutoProcess auto process the read request.
Returns:
true if the reading succeeds, false otherwise.

bool write ( DWORD  dwOffset,
T *  pSrc,
bool  bAutoProcess = true 
) [inline]

Write offset value to FSUIPC.

Template Parameters:
T the type of the offset (must be the exact alignment).
Parameters:
dwOffset the internal FSUIPC address of the offset.
pSrc a pointer to the data to be read.
bAutoProcess auto process the write request.
Returns:
true if the writing succeeds, false otherwise.
